post.title: Don on SOA
post.content: I’m sure I’m the last blogger to watch Don’s MSDN TV episodes on SOA. But if I’m not, go watch them right now. I especially like Don’s comments on XML Schema. They echo my own, but are much more coherent. Plus, it makes me glad I’ve never swapped out a CPU.
